ftbquests.chapter.nether_delights.title: Sky High Delights[--天空之乐--]
ftbquests.chapter.nether_delights.quests: Sky High Villagers[--空高村民--]
Hmmmm[--嗯--]
Hidden among the clouds, far from your island, you can find &bSky Villages&r.[--隐藏在云雾中,远离你的岛屿,你可以找到&bSky Indowns&r.--]
Here you can find Villagers to trade with, as well as &6chests to loot&r![--在这里,你可以找到村民来交易,也可以找到&6箱子来战利品&r!--]
There's a bunch of &6new trades&r, for &eTetra&r materials and blueprints, various magical items, etc. Make sure to try them all![--有一堆&6新交易&r,用于&eTetra&r的材料和蓝图,各种魔法物品等等。确保尝试全部!--]
The mod &eEasy Villagers&r adds a bunch of convenient blocks to automate Villager functions![--mod&e轻松村民&r增加了一堆便携方块来自动化村民的功能!--]
Find a Sky Village[--找到一个天空村庄--]
¿Donde estan?[--[7]Donde Estan?--]

The &bEye of Legend&r works just like an Eye of Ender, but instead of taking you to a Stronghold, it &6points you in the direction of the nearest Sky Village&r![--&b传说之眼&r就像末影之眼一样工作,但它没有将你带往要塞,而是&6将你指向最近的天空村庄&r!--]
Make sure to &6bring a way back home&r with you![--确保&6与你一起&r找到回家的路&r!--]
Kie ili estas?[--Kie ili estas?--]
Unlike the other two, the &bEnd Eye of Legend&r does not point you to a village.[--和其他两个不同的是,&b末影传说之眼&r不会指向村庄.--]
Instead, it brings you to &6End Cities&r. Similar, but distinctly different. There's nothing to trade, just loot.[--它会把你带去&6末地城&r。相似,但特别不同。没有可交易的东西,只是战利品.--]
Waar zijn ze?[--瓦卡兹?--]
The &bNether Eye of Legend&r works the same, but points you in the direction of the nearest &6Nether Sky Village&r.[--&b下界传说之眼&r工作原理相同,但指引你最近的&6下界天空村庄&r的方向.--]
Nether Sky Villages[--下界天空村庄--]
Varken heeft waren, als je munten hebt[--Vaken Heeft waren, Als Je Muunten Hebt--]
&bNether Sky Villages&r can be found flying in the Nether's void.[--&b下界天空村庄&r可以在下界虚空中找到.--]
Here, you can &6barter with the Pigmen&r by tossing them some gold![--在这里,你可以&6用猪人&r扔一些金子!--]
Find a Crimson Sky Village[--找到一个绯红木天空村庄--]
Find a Warped Sky Village[--找到一个诡异木天空村庄--]
